doc.description: Reads out values through uart of an laser range ring (array), containing multiple ToF IR laser range modules

configure.name: LASER_RANGE_ARRAY_PORT
configure.description: select which uart it is connected to

configure.name: LASER_RANGE_ARRAY_BAUD
configure.description: set the baudrate of the uart

define.name: LASER_RANGE_ARRAY_NUM_SENSORS
define.description: Total amount of laser range sensors on the airframe

define.name: LASER_RANGE_ARRAY_ORIENTATIONS
define.description: The orientation per laser range sensor in the order: elevation,heading. The array is built up like (elv_1, head_1, elv_2, head_2,...elv_n, head_n) with n=LASER_RANGE_ARRAY_NUM_SENSORS
